overview: Enjoy nearly 2 hours of classic cartoons for kids of all ages for Halloween or anytime you're looking for a fun, scary time. Includes 5 classic Casper the Friendly Ghost cartoons (including the first one ever produced), along with others starring Popeye the Sailor Man, Betty Boop, Daffy Duck, Superman and various Looney Tunes & Merry Melodies cartoons. Remastered sound for a creepy, funny holiday.
title: Halloween Cartoons: 16 Cartoon Classics
